G

getch() - Method in class Getch2
getch returns the next character from the input (or EOF).
getch() - Static method in class WordCount1
getch returns a character removed from buf, or, if buf is empty, getch returns a character from standard input (or EOF).
Getch2 - Class in <Unnamed>
Getch2 is intended to be an object-oriented translation of the getch and ungetch functions in K&R p.
Getch2() - Constructor for class Getch2
This constructor creates a Getch2 object that will read from standard input.
getWord(StringBuilder) - Static method in class WordCount1
getWord stores the next word or non-space character from standard input into its StringBuilder parameter.
getWord(StringBuilder, Getch2) - Static method in class WordCount2
getWord stores the next word or non-space character from the Getch2 object into its StringBuilder parameter.
